attributes.action: Extend the protective anti-discrimation legislation to include volunteers
attributes.additional_details: This petition urges the government to include unpaid volunteers in the legal protection already provided to paid staff by including volunteers in the protection given by anti-discrimination/anti-harassment  legislation. That is a volunteer should be able to take their complaint to an independent tribunal or court of law to achieve resolution and if necessary compensation for abuse suffered in a workplace (e.g. sexism, racism, homophobia and ageism).
